user_query: I need to find the document types that have been modified since yesterday. Can you provide me with the updated document types and the companies that have been modified recently? Also, search for the lyrics of the song 'Bad' by Michael Jackson.

TaskList.description: Query the document management system to retrieve the types of documents that have been modified since yesterday.
From the result of subtask 1, extract and list the companies associated with the modified document types.
Search for the lyrics of the song 'Bad' by Michael Jackson.
